title: Social Constructivist-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Project for Knowledge Sharing and Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational math understanding and online learning platform proficiency
context.additional_context: Course for office/administrative professionals to enhance knowledge management and organizational learning competencies in mathematical problem-solving processes. Establishes a culture of tacit knowledge sharing through asynchronous collaboration

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to collaborate with peers and share knowledge to solve complex mathematical problems.
Learners establish effective knowledge management strategies in an organizational learning environment through project-based assessments.
Learners exchange and reflect on mathematical ideas according to social constructivist principles in online discussion forums.

resources: Digital collaboration tools (shared documents, video conferencing)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
